file_content.text: A pleasure doing business with you.
Lord Anathemos? I understand you were looking for this holocron.
That holocron! Where did you get it? Give it to me!
No, wait--this must be a trap. I'm not fooled.
I'll give you this holocron in exchange for the use of your assassins.
It's not a trap, it's a deal.
Hmm. You think you can buy my assassins' services with a holocron. It seems plausible enough.
There's a Jedi Padawan I want dead. I understand you have the means.
I need your assassins.
Just let me use your assassins.
Oh, shut up.
My assassins. You must think I value that holocron pretty highly.
I wonder, what do you need them for?
I need the help of a Padawan to get into the Jedi Enclave. I want you to scare her.
I want into the Jedi Enclave.
I am laying a trap for a Padawan.
There's a Jedi girl....
Simple enough. My assassins will be glad to... wait.
You're aware the Jedi have brought a group of Padawans to Taris?
You know the Jedi on Taris.
Yes. The fools. This is no place for Padawans. Wait. You don't mean...?
Why would a powerful Sith Lord like yourself hire assassins to kill a mere Padawan?
Do you think I'm an idiot? I will not be taken for an idiot.
The Padawan must believe she is in danger, so I can save her.
Help me lay my trap.
Playing games with mice, are we?
If you think your assassins can't handle a Padawan, I'll take this holocron elsewhere.
You're a coward.
Fine. Though I'm sure I will live to regret it. The assassins are yours.
Just tell me where they should wait, and who they should target....
Her name's Ashara Zavros....
Listen closely.
I need you to drive her toward this enclave in the swamps....
Do exactly as I say.
She'll be near the Republic base, but you can catch her when she's training....
Here's the plan.
Stop acting like one. This is no trap. Listen closely....
You're an idiot.
This better be good....
I see. So my assassins flush this Padawan out, and then you play the hero. You'll be using some manner of mind trick, I trust.
So be it. Now give me the holocron.
I'm too busy to speak with you right now.
